title: fail to set tag in find results
body:
i've got an applescript to create a note that works:

tell application "Evernote"
  set matches to find notes "intitle:\"failing ticket\""
  if matches = {}
    set note1 to create note title "failing ticket" with text "text"
  end if
end tell

and another one to set the tag of that ticket

tell application "Evernote"
  set myNotes to find notes "failing ticket"
  assign tag "awesome" to myNotes
  set myNote to item 1 of myNotes
  open note window with myNote -- the note opens successfully but without a tag
  activate
end

I execute the first script to create the note and everything is all right. When im executing script number two, im getting this error

278:313: execution error: Evernote got an error: Canâ€™t get note id "x-coredata://4A870B3B-A9F5-4F93-A82A-5715CD9C0BF8/ENNote/p11497" of notebook "notebood". (-1728)

I've gotten the code from the official applescript guide but i still can't get it to work.

Am I missing something ?
